trans-unit.source: An abstract WCF extension class for specifying a custom discovery service or for getting the published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: En abstrakt WCF utvidelsen klasse for å angi en egendefinert søketjeneste eller for å få de publiserte endepunktene.

trans-unit.source: Derive a class from DiscoveryServiceExtension and override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> method to return your custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: Avledet en klasse fra DiscoveryServiceExtension og overstyring av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>metode til å returnere den egendefinerte søketjeneste.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add your derived class to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> extensions that host your discoverable service.
trans-unit.target: Legg til den utledede klassen til de <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>utvidelser som er vert for synlig tjenesten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A> is called the behavior iterates through the extensions in the service host and looks for a DiscoveryServiceExtension.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>kalles virkemåten går gjennom filtypene i Tjenesteverten og ser etter en DiscoveryServiceExtension.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If one is found its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> is called to get the custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en finnes det <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>kalles for å få tjenesten egendefinerte discovery.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an extension is not found the default discovery service implementation is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en utvidelse ikke finner standard discovery service implementering brukes.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return your custom <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre denne metoden for å returnere egendefinert <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"> </xref> implementering.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown while opening the service host if this method returns `null`
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>oppstod under åpning Tjenesteverten Hvis denne metoden returnerer `null` </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Henter en skrivebeskyttet samling publiserte endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: The property should be accessed only after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> has successfully opened.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen skal åpnes bare når den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>er åpnet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> is in <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> is being generated and added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>tilstand, den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata>blir generert og legges til i samlingen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of published endpoints.
